input.sentences: i went to the star wars toy convention this summer !
i got an awesome yoda action figure .
they had a ton of huge action figures | even for sale !
they had hundreds of options of different characters .
there was also a massive star wars card collection !
output.sentences: I waited all summer to buy a star wars toy
This yoda figure was next to this awesome lamp
I couldn't believe this thing was for sale because it was huge and weighs a ton
I had so many options to pick because there are hundreds of characters
the whole star wars franchise is massive
